cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: Anskaffelsens formÃ¥l er kjÃ¸p av angio intervensjonslaboratorium â€“ monoplan til RÃ¸ntgenavdelingen ved Universitetssykehuset Nord-Norge HF (UNN). The objective of the procurement is the procurement of angio intervention laboratory - monoplane for the X-ray department at the University Hospital of North Norway (UNN). The equipment shall be used for general radiology on all organ systems except heart. Tenders are also wanted for the procurement of angio intervention laboratory - biplane. The investment is not approved and we reserve the right to make a purchase if the investment is approved by the health company. The contracting authority will invite tenderers who have registered their interest after the prior information notice, to confirm their interest.
